name: Jalopy Records Seven Inch Subscription Series
blurb: A shiny new album sent every 4 weeks! 13 albums like gifts given all year long by great American folk, roots, blues & country artists!

name: Round 2 - Dirty Red & The SoulShakers "Cloudless Day"
blurb: Dirty Red & The SoulShakers are a 4-piece, blues band from Oklahoma, working to finish their new album, Cloudless Day.

name: Crossover - Dan Whitener's five-song blues EP!
blurb: Pre-order my latest album of original songs featuring world-class artists I've met during my time on the road.

name: Louisa County Blues
blurb: We have recorded a new album of traditional, acoustic blues featuring harmonica, mandolin, guitar and vocals.

name: Brave Rival are making an album!
blurb: A brand new rip-roaring blues-rock and soul machine

name: Echoes from Iron Ore
blurb: Recorded at the edge of everywhere

name: Devil May Care: limited edition red vinyl
blurb: Devil May Care is Dave Arcari's seventh album length release...this red vinyl edition will come with a bonus track.
